mapper.select: /* staffClaimMapper.selectNextClmNo */ SELECT 'J4' || TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm') || NVL (TO_CHAR (MAX (SUBSTR (CLM_NO, 7, 4) + 1), 'FM0000'), '0001') AS CLM_NO FROM FCM0019M WHERE SUBSTR (CLM_NO, 3, 4) = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm') AND CLM_TYPE = 'J4'
/* staffClaimMapper.selectNextClmSeq */ SELECT NVL(MAX(CLM_SEQ) + 1, 1) AS CLM_SEQ FROM FCM0020D WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo}
select COST_CENTER_TEXT as COSTCTR from FCM0008M where COST_CENTER = #{costCenter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FCM0019M ( CLM_NO, CLM_TYPE, COST_CENTR, COST_CENTR_NAME, MEM_ACC_ID, /*BANK_CODE, BANK_ACC_NO,*/ CLM_MONTH, TOT_AMT, CRT_DT, CRT_USER_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USER_ID, CLM_FLG ) VALUES ( #{clmNo}, #{clmType}, #{costCenter}, #{costCenterNm}, #{memAccId}, /* BANK, BANK_ACC_NO */ TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{clmMth}, 'MM/YYYY'), 'YYYYMM'), '0', SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, #{clmFlg} )
mapper.update: MERGE INTO FCM0019M A USING ( SELECT CLM_NO, SUM(TOT_AMT) TOT_AMT FROM FCM0020D WHERE CLM_NO = #{claimNo}--'J418090018' GROUP BY CLM_NO ) B ON (A.CLM_NO = B.CLM_NO) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.TOT_AMT = B.TOT_AMT
mapper.select: SELECT A.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID || '-' || C.ATCH_FILE_ID AS ATCHINFO FROM FCM0020D A INNER JOIN SYS0070M B ON A.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = B.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID INNER JOIN SYS0071D C ON B.ATCH_FILE_ID = C.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE A.CLM_NO = #{claimNo} GROUP BY A.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID || '-' || C.ATCH_FILE_ID
/* staffClaimMapper.getTotAmt */ SELECT TOT_AMT FROM FCM0019M where CLM_NO = #{claimNo}
